tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Employee_Performance (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  performance_rating INT,
  attendance_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    check_in TIMESTAMP,
    check_out TIMESTAMP,
    is_absent BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Employees (employee_id INT, employee_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255), hire_date DATE, salary DECIMAL(10, 2), PRIMARY KEY (employee_id))

CREATE TABLE Attendance (attendance_id INT, employee_id INT, attendance_date DATE, start_time TIME, end_time TIME, hours_worked DECIMAL(5, 2), PRIMARY KEY (attendance_id), FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id))

CREATE TABLE Performance (performance_id INT, employee_id INT, productivity_score DECIMAL(5, 2), attendance_score DECIMAL(5, 2), feedback VARCHAR(1000), PRIMARY KEY (performance_id), FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id))

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE attendance (
  attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  hours_worked INT
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(50),
  manager_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE managers (
  manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  department_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    salary DECIMAL,
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time_in TIME,
    time_out TIME
)

CREATE TABLE performance_rating (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL,
    review TEXT,
    rating_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR,
    manager_id INT,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE managers (
    manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manager_name VARCHAR,
    department_id INT,
    hire_date DATE
)
